data.title: Barcelona Sants to Cerbère by Train from €34
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Barcelona Sants to Cerbère in 2h 4m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets ✅ for Barcelona Sants to Cerbère today.
data.text:
Want to find out more about taking the train from Barcelona Sants to Cerbère? Look no further.

You'll usually find 5 trains per day running between Barcelona Sants and Cerbère, which usually take 2 hours 37 minutes to complete the 145 km journey. It can take as little as 2 hours 4 minutes on the fastest services though, if you want to get there as quickly as possible. Although there aren't any direct services on this line, it's still easy to travel to Cerbère from Barcelona Sants, you'll just need to make 1 change along the way. During your journey, you're likely to be traveling with TGV, AVE or Renfe, as these are the main train operators on this route.

You can save money on train tickets from Barcelona Sants to Cerbère if you book in advance, as tickets usually start from €34.00. Use our Journey Planner at the top of the page to compare ticket prices and get the cheapest fares.

Want to book your train tickets now? Just start a search with us today. If you want to find out more about the journey, read on for train schedules (including first and last train times), FAQs and tips on how to book cheap train tickets.
